column3: The total number of confirmed COVID-19 patients who have been hospitalized and discharged.
column4: Total currently hospitalized patients confirmed positive COVID-19.
column5: Total currently receiving inpatient hospital care whose COVID-19 test results are pending.
column6: Combined number of confirmed positive COVID-19 patients, and those whose COVID-19 test results are pending, currently hospitalized in the ICU.
column7: Combined number of hospital patients, both confirmed for COVID-19, and those with test results pending, currently on a ventilator.
column9: Total ventilators in use at hospitals.
column10: Share of total ventilators in use
column13: Number of Virginia hospitals experiencing difficulty in obtaining or replenishing PPE in the next 72 hours.
column14: The number of Virginia hospitals experiencing difficulty in obtaining or replenishing other medical supplies in the next 72 hours.
